img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2d/Wukong_YellowFlower_24.jpg)
Even when not slamming the ground, his bigger sword can also cut through the air to send a slicing wave of force at you from a distance, which comes out much faster than his slams, and can be done multiple times.
img_below_text:
However, if he decides to hold his left weapon up by his face in a reverse grip fashion, it will become his shield, and he'll be able to soak any blows you try and land on him (even when Immobilized). Hit him too many times, and he'll launch into a swift two-hit counterattack. Luckily, you can counter his counter with a well-timed Rock Solid to throw him off.
![Wukong YellowFlower 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/06/Wukong_YellowFlower_20.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2d/Wukong_YellowFlower_24.jpg)
Even when not slamming the ground, his bigger sword can also cut through the air to send a slicing wave of force at you from a distance, which comes out much faster than his slams, and can be done multiple times."
        - Following Text: "However, if he decides to hold his left weapon up by his face in a reverse grip fashion, it will become his shield, and he'll be able to soak any blows you try and land on him (even when Immobilized). Hit him too many times, and he'll launch into a swift two-hit counterattack. Luckily, you can counter his counter with a well-timed Rock Solid to throw him off.
![Wukong YellowFlower 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/06/Wukong_YellowFlower_20.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an intense combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player character battling a boss named "Commander Beetle." The boss wields a large sword, which is seen delivering a powerful, glowing strike against the player. The preceding text highlights the boss's ability to send slicing waves of force from a distance, while the following text describes its defensive stance using its weapon as a shield and counterattacking. The image visually emphasizes the boss's aggressive attack phase.
